Some important messages. This is really important so if you are mentioned make sure you take action as we will be following this up. If you have seen a patient and identified a problem you must give them treatment and follow up to see if it has worked. If it has not worked you must refer them and make sure we know about it. 1. Dorothy. A. You saw patient called Xander, 30 years old, male on 6th February. They had right sided ear wax. You said you gave olive oil and they needed a washout on saturday. Please confirm when you have done this and the outcome. B. You referred a 53 year old lady who came to see you who had been using antibiotic drops in her right ear. She was seen by us at Seeta nazigo yesterday. She has some hearing loss and some wax in the ear. She needs to be followed up on Friday and assessed to see if she needs a referral to mulago. 2. Luke. A. You saw a 1 year old boy. He has a left ear drum perforation. We washout and dried. We gave antibiotic ear drops. Dr. Zanetta will see him Monday morning at mulago old hospital ent outpatient clinic. Please make sure mum takes him and report back to us the outcome. B. You saw a 5 year old girl with her grandmother yesterday. She needs a follow up on Friday morning with us to see if the antibiotics are making things better. If not she needs a referral to mulago. C. You saw a 69 year old lady on 6th february. Her image has been reviewed by Dr. Arthur. He said it is just wax and itching should settle down over time. Please reassure her. 3. Gordon. A. You saw the 21 year old girl yesterday with the perforation of the ear drum. We need to follow her up Monday afternoon. All other VHTs keep up your good work.
